targets.rawSql:
select * from (
SELECT
  ROUND(((@rank - rank) / @rank) * 100, 2) AS percentile_rank, c.status_duration_hours as status_duration_hours
FROM
  (SELECT
     *,
     @prev:=@curr,
     @curr:=status_duration_hours,
     @rank:=IF(@prev = @curr, @rank, @rank + 1) AS rank
   FROM
     (
       SELECT issue_id, sum(status_duration_hours) as status_duration_hours FROM issue_duration_in_status
       where status_name in ($status)
             and planning_period in ($period)
             and issue_type in ($issue_type)
             and team in ($team)
             and $__timeFilter(status_end)
             group by issue_id
     ) AS a,
     (SELECT @curr:= null, @prev:= null, @rank:= 0) AS b
   ORDER BY status_duration_hours DESC) AS c) as d
where (d.percentile_rank BETWEEN 25 AND 55)
order by 1 desc
limit 1

select * from (
SELECT
  ROUND(((@rank - rank) / @rank) * 100, 2) AS percentile_rank, c.status_duration_hours as status_duration_hours
FROM

       where status_name in ($status)

             and team in ($team)
             and $__timeFilter(status_end)
             group by issue_id
     ) AS a,
     (SELECT @curr:= null, @prev:= null, @rank:= 0) AS b
   ORDER BY status_duration_hours DESC) AS c) as d
where (d.percentile_rank BETWEEN 56 AND 77)
order by 1 desc
limit 1

SELECT issue_id, sum(status_duration_hours) as status_duration_hours, max(status_end) as time_sec FROM issue_duration_in_status
       where status_name in ($status)
             and planning_period in ($period)
             and issue_type in ($issue_type)
             and team in ($team)
             and $__timeFilter(status_end)
             group by issue_id

current.text: Create Demo + In Development + On Hold + Refine + Testing In Progress + To Be Tested + Waiting for Review

list.name: status
list.tagValuesQuery: select status_name, tag from status_category where tag = '$tag'

current.text: Freedom + Griffin + Hawk + Icarus + Joy + Krypton

title: Jira Metrics - Percentiles over Time - Team
